rules_text:
As long as Champion of Ideals has one or more +1/+1 counters on it, it's an Angel with base power and toughness 4/4, flying, vigilance, and lifelink.
{3}{G}: Judge target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Honor it by putting a +1/+1 counter on it or condemn it by sacrificing it to draw a card.)[/i]
